"Beach Wars 2!":
"Summer! Sea! And not forgetting Xie!
We're having a nice hot summer this year!
Summer means sea, and sea means Wopal!
But Darkers and Oceanids are running wild
all over the beaches of Wopal!
If we're ever going to relax on those
beautiful beaches again, I need all your help!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Be defeated in the final area,
time limit expires."
